class.name: lbr_ros2_control/LBRForwardPositionCommandController
class.description: Forward command controller for LBRPositionCommand message, see lbr_fri_msgs/msg/LBRPositionCommand.msg.

class.name: lbr_ros2_control/LBRForwardTorqueCommandController
class.description: Forward command controller for LBRTorqueCommand message, see lbr_fri_msgs/msg/LBRTorqueCommand.msg.
